ovdesc.p: Delivery message types can be grouped by meaningful terms such as Statement, Advice, Alert etc through DE.MESSAGE.GROUP.
Customer Preferences make use of MESSAGE.GROUP for creation of DE.PRODUCT.

desc.p: This holds the description of group
Holds the description of Message group.
Group name can be like STATEMENT, ALERT
Holds Combination of Message types and application
2) MESSAGE.APP should possess 2 parts delimited by a dot.

First part be a valid message type and second part be a valid prefix of an application defined in EB.PRODUCT or be specified as ALL or be specific as ACN1/ACN2/ACC2/ACC2/ACI1/ACI2 representing the Account type (Customer account or Nostro or Internal) and Frequency.
950.ACN1 – all 950 message types for module AC type N1
Contains all the override messages which the user has
At validation,the system may generate a series of screen
override messages to indicate some anomaly within the
transaction (e.g. maturity date is not a working day for
this currency). User may change the data or override the
